channel.title: RSCA Client
channel.description: I would like to know what exactly was wrong with the client making it incapable of handling so many players in a certain area. If somebody could give me a hint that would be great.

item.title: RSCA Client

item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Haha, Alright ill just need to double check it. Thanks for the information. Stork is such a bad ass he does not need to deal with packet corruption. Im assuming your referring to varekd. Thanks again.

Also would anybody have a fully deobbed 202 client? I believe the client released with moonspell is the most refactored (publicly) 202 client.
